questions.question: What React hook manages side effects?
questions.explanation: useEffect handles side effects in functional components.

questions.question: What React feature shares state without props?
What Vue feature computes derived data?
questions.explanation: Computed properties calculate values from reactive data.

questions.question: What Vue feature watches data changes?
What Angular structure extends HTML?
questions.explanation: Directives add behavior to HTML elements.

questions.question: What React pattern renders content conditionally?
questions.explanation: Conditional rendering shows elements based on conditions.

questions.question: What method iterates and renders arrays in React?
questions.explanation: map transforms arrays into JSX elements.

questions.question: What Vue CLI command creates projects?
questions.explanation: vue create initializes new Vue projects.
